mapper.select: SELECT sf_id, sf_sfc_id, sf_name, sf_form, sf_usearbityn, sf_publicyn, sf_wrtrslctyn, sf_usepresnctyn, sf_emp_receiverid, sf_registdat, sf_emp_registerid, sf_changedat, sf_emp_changerid, sf_useyn, sf_cmp_id FROM snctform WHERE sf_id = #{sdcSfId}

WITH DETAIL AS ( SELECT sl_id, sl_cmp_id, sl_emp_no, sl_useyn , sdt_order, sdt_sl_id, sdt_emp_no , a.emp_no A_EMP_NO, a.emp_name A_EMP_NAME, a.emp_dpt_id1 A_EMP_DPT_ID1, a.emp_jobposition A_EMP_JOBPOSITION , a.dpt_id A_DPT_ID, a.dpt_parentdptid A_DPT_PARENTDPTID, a.dpt_name A_DPT_NAME, a.dpt_head A_DPT_HEAD FROM snctline INNER JOIN snctdetail ON (sl_id = sdt_sl_id) INNER JOIN employee a ON (sdt_emp_no = a.emp_no) INNER JOIN department a ON (a.emp_dpt_id1 = a.dpt_id) ) SELECT sdc_id, sdc_sf_id, sdc_sfc_id , sdc_title, sdc_emp_no, sdc_content , sdc_attchpath, sdc_emrgcyyn , TO_CHAR(sdc_reportdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sdc_reportdat , sdc_tempyn, sdc_result, sdc_docno , sdc_sl_id, sdc_cmp_id , sf_id, sf_name, sf_usearbityn , sf_publicyn, sf_wrtrslctyn, sf_usepresnctyn , emp_no, emp_name, emp_dpt_id1, emp_dpt_id2 , dpt_id, dpt_parentdptid, dpt_order, dpt_localext , dpt_name, dpt_head , DETAIL.* , ss_sdc_id, ss_sdt_order, ss_emp_no , TO_CHAR(ss_snctdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ss_snctdat , ss_remark, ss_status , CASE ss_type WHEN 'A' THEN '승인' WHEN 'B' THEN '반려' WHEN 'C' THEN '전결' WHEN 'D' THEN '선결' WHEN 'E' THEN '반려' WHEN 'F' THEN '전결' WHEN 'G' THEN '후결' ELSE '결재대기' END AS ss_type_a FROM snctdocument INNER JOIN snctform ON ( sdc_sf_id = sf_id ) INNER JOIN employee ON ( sdc_emp_no = emp_no) INNER JOIN department ON (emp_dpt_id1= dpt_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN DETAIL on (sdc_sl_id = DETAIL.sl_id) INNER JOIN snctstatus ON (sdc_id = ss_sdc_id) and (DETAIL.A_EMP_NO = ss_emp_no) WHERE sdc_id = #{sdcId} ORDER BY SS_SDT_ORDER ASC

SELECT sdc_id, sdc_sf_id, sdc_sfc_id , sdc_title, sdc_emp_no , sdc_attchpath, sdc_emrgcyyn , TO_CHAR(sdc_reportdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sdc_reportdat , sdc_tempyn, sdc_result, sdc_docno , sdc_sl_id, sdc_cmp_id , sf_id, sf_name, sf_usearbityn , sf_publicyn, sf_wrtrslctyn, sf_usepresnctyn , emp_no, emp_name, emp_dpt_id1, emp_dpt_id2 FROM snctdocument INNER JOIN snctform ON ( sdc_sf_id = sf_id ) INNER JOIN employee ON ( sdc_emp_no = emp_no)
ORDER BY sdc_reportdat DESC

SELECT ss_emp_no, ss_sdc_id, ss_sdt_order, ss_type , sdc_id, sdc_sf_id, sdc_sfc_id , sdc_title, sdc_emp_no , sdc_attchpath, sdc_emrgcyyn , TO_CHAR(sdc_reportdat, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS sdc_reportdat , sdc_tempyn, sdc_result, sdc_docno , sdc_sl_id, sdc_cmp_id , sf_id, sf_name, sf_usearbityn , sf_publicyn, sf_wrtrslctyn, sf_usepresnctyn , emp_no, emp_name, emp_dpt_id1, emp_dpt_id2 FROM snctstatus INNER JOIN snctdocument ON (ss_sdc_id = sdc_id) INNER JOIN snctform ON ( sdc_sf_id = sf_id ) INNER JOIN employee ON ( sdc_emp_no = emp_no)
ORDER BY sdc_reportdat ASC
ORDER BY sdc_reportdat DESC

SELECT SUBSTR(#{sdcId}, 1, LENGTH(#{sdcId}) - 13)||'-'||LPAD(NVL(to_number(SUBSTR(MAX(SDC_DOCNO), LENGTH(#{sdcId})-11)), 0) +1, 7, '0') FROM snctdocument WHERE SDC_CMP_ID = SUBSTR(#{sdcId}, 1, LENGTH(#{sdcId}) - 13)
UPDATE snctdocument SET sdc_result = #{sdcResult} , sdc_docno = #{sdcDocno} WHERE sdc_id = #{sdcId}
